title: Intermittent 'File not Found' error when loading large CSV file on ray cluster
body:
I'm trying to train a ludwig model on a large CSV file (which can be found at `s3://daniel-ml-data-predibase/ispy2/ispy2_n119_pathology.csv`).  Using a single AWS instance p3.2xlarge launched with `ray up`.

When I try to run `ludwig train -c config_local.yaml --dataset ispy2_n119_pathology.csv` I get this error about 80% of the time:

However, sometimes this command succeeds.  For some reason it works more often when I detach from the cluster then reattach.

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/bin/ludwig", line 33, in <module>
    sys.exit(load_entry_point('ludwig', 'console_scripts', 'ludwig')())
  File "/ludwig/ludwig/cli.py", line 158, in main
    CLI()
  File "/ludwig/ludwig/cli.py", line 63, in __init__
    getattr(self, args.command)()
  File "/ludwig/ludwig/cli.py", line 68, in train
    train.cli(sys.argv[2:])
  File "/ludwig/ludwig/train.py", line 387, in cli
    train_cli(**vars(args))
  File "/ludwig/ludwig/train.py", line 181, in train_cli
    model.train(
  File "/ludwig/ludwig/api.py", line 426, in train
    preprocessed_data = self.preprocess(
  File "/ludwig/ludwig/api.py", line 1266, in preprocess
    preprocessed_data = preprocess_for_training(
  File "/ludwig/ludwig/data/preprocessing.py", line 1524, in preprocess_for_training
    processed = data_format_processor.preprocess_for_training(
  File "/ludwig/ludwig/data/preprocessing.py", line 274, in preprocess_for_training
    return _preprocess_file_for_training(
  File "/ludwig/ludwig/data/preprocessing.py", line 1605, in _preprocess_file_for_training
    data, training_set_metadata = build_dataset(
  File "/ludwig/ludwig/data/preprocessing.py", line 1107, in build_dataset
    proc_cols = build_data(dataset_cols, feature_configs, metadata, backend, skip_save_processed_input)
  File "/ludwig/ludwig/data/preprocessing.py", line 1240, in build_data
    get_from_registry(feature_config[TYPE], base_type_registry).add_feature_data(
  File "/ludwig/ludwig/features/image_feature.py", line 366, in add_feature_data
    num_images = len(input_df[feature_config[COLUMN]])
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dask/dataframe/core.py", line 626, in __len__
    return self.reduction(
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dask/base.py", line 288, in compute
    (result,) = compute(self, traverse=False, **kwargs)
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dask/base.py", line 571, in compute
    results = schedule(dsk, keys, **kwargs)
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ray/util/dask/scheduler.py", line 202, in ray_dask_get
    result = ray_get_unpack(object_refs, progress_bar_actor=pb_actor)
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ray/util/dask/scheduler.py", line 503, in ray_get_unpack
    computed_result = get_result(object_refs)
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ray/util/dask/scheduler.py", line 490, in get_result
    return ray.get(object_refs)
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ray/_private/client_mode_hook.py", line 105, in wrapper
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ray/worker.py", line 1809, in get
    raise value.as_instanceof_cause()
ray.exceptions.RayTaskError(FileNotFoundError): ray::dask:('len-agg-1b0b8789e53802aad0d69772a58a5e68', 0) (pid=6750, ip=172.31.11.137)
  At least one of the input arguments for this task could not be computed:
ray.exceptions.RayTaskError: ray::dask:('len-chunk-1b0b8789e53802aad0d69772a58a5e68', 0, 0, 0) (pid=6750, ip=172.31.11.137)
  At least one of the input arguments for this task could not be computed:
ray.exceptions.RayTaskError: ray::dask:('overlap-fillna-7993d682dc629c9b06ae2139fc3d38c4', 0) (pid=6750, ip=172.31.11.137)
  At least one of the input arguments for this task could not be computed:
ray.exceptions.RayTaskError: ray::dask:('fillna-chunk-30e2a084a293bb547712f27033338623', 0) (pid=6750, ip=172.31.11.137)
  At least one of the input arguments for this task could not be computed:
ray.exceptions.RayTaskError: ray::dask:('overlap-fillna-939acee453437d1972e9064dfc371e00', 0) (pid=6750, ip=172.31.11.137)
  At least one of the input arguments for this task could not be computed:
ray.exceptions.RayTaskError: ray::dask:('fillna-chunk-a1590ea6f1c35310adcbbb5a8f9da18a', 0) (pid=6750, ip=172.31.11.137)
  At least one of the input arguments for this task could not be computed:
ray.exceptions.RayTaskError: ray::dask:('getitem-91eb8175bc4448b05e894e210b4dbe41', 0) (pid=6750, ip=172.31.11.137)
  At least one of the input arguments for this task could not be computed:
ray.exceptions.RayTaskError: ray::dask:('read-csv-36b9ca37bb3f7104f9857bdc74b2499e', 0) (pid=1410, ip=172.31.0.49)
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ray/util/dask/scheduler.py", line 429, in dask_task_wrapper
    actual_args = [_execute_task(a, repacked_deps) for a in repacked_args]
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ray/util/dask/scheduler.py", line 429, in <listcomp>
    actual_args = [_execute_task(a, repacked_deps) for a in repacked_args]
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dask/core.py", line 113, in _execute_task
    return [_execute_task(a, cache) for a in arg]
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dask/core.py", line 113, in <listcomp>
    return [_execute_task(a, cache) for a in arg]
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dask/core.py", line 119, in _execute_task
    return func(*(_execute_task(a, cache) for a in args))
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dask/bytes/core.py", line 189, in read_block_from_file
    with copy.copy(lazy_file) as f:
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/fsspec/core.py", line 103, in __enter__
    f = self.fs.open(self.path, mode=mode)
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/fsspec/spec.py", line 1006, in open
    f = self._open(
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/fsspec/implementations/local.py", line 155, in _open
    return LocalFileOpener(path, mode, fs=self, **kwargs)
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/fsspec/implementations/local.py", line 250, in __init__
    self._open()
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/fsspec/implementations/local.py", line 255, in _open
    self.f = open(self.path, mode=self.mode)
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/data/ispy2_n119_pathology.csv'
```
